channel.title: Adding shops that take Pk points
channel.description: Can someone help me make a shop that takes PK points? I meen actually takes them. For example if you had 36 pk points, and in the shop you bought a yellow p hat for 30 pk points, your total pk points would move down to 6. Is this even possible to do? Thanks in advance to anyone who helps.

item.title: Adding shops that take Pk points
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:

Can someone help me make a shop that takes PK points? I meen actually takes them. For example if you had 36 pk points, and in the shop you bought a yellow p hat for 30 pk points, your total pk points would move down to 6. Is this even possible to do? Thanks in advance to anyone who helps.
